    Contact & Join Us

    Get in Touch

    Lab Location

    Room 501, Technology Building
    Department of Electrical Engineering
    National Taiwan Normal University
    162, Section 1, Heping East Road
    Taipei 10610, Taiwan

    Email

    mailab@ntnu.edu.tw

    Phone

    +886-2-7749-3535

    Office Hours

    Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM

    Join Our Lab

    We are always looking for talented and motivated individuals to join our research team. If you're interested in working with us, please review the opportunities below.

    PhD & Master's Programs

    We offer opportunities for graduate students interested in computer vision, deep learning, and multimedia analysis. Students receive mentorship, access to computing resources, and opportunities to publish in top venues.

    Apply to NTNU

    Postdoctoral Positions

    We regularly have openings for postdoctoral researchers to lead projects, mentor students, and collaborate with international partners.

    Contact Us

    Undergraduate Research

    NTNU undergraduates can gain research experience working on components of larger projects while receiving mentorship from graduate students and faculty.

    Contact Us

    How to Apply

    If you're interested in joining our lab, please email us at mailab@ntnu.edu.tw with:

    • Your CV/resume
    • Brief description of your research interests
    • Why you're interested in our lab specifically
    • For postdocs: Include a research statement and 1-2 representative publications

    We encourage you to review our research areas and publications before applying.

    Collaborations & Partnerships

    We are open to collaborations with academic institutions, industry partners, and government organizations. If you're interested in working with us, please reach out via email with a brief description of the potential collaboration.

    Academic Collaborations

    Joint research projects, student exchanges, and shared publications with universities worldwide.

    Industry Partnerships

    Research sponsorships, technology transfer, and consulting services for companies developing AI technologies.

    International Networks

    Participation in international research networks, conferences, and workshops in our fields of expertise.

    Visit Our Lab

    We welcome visitors who are interested in our research. If you'd like to visit our lab, please email us in advance to schedule an appointment.

    Directions from MRT (Taipei Metro)

    From Guting Station (Green Line): Take Exit 2 and walk east on Heping East Road for about 10 minutes to reach the NTNU campus.

    From Technology Building Station (Brown Line): Take Exit 3 and walk south for about a 5-minute walk to reach the NTNU campus.
